src_original: asyade yaṁkṣīra bhojanaṁ kundūrū dhupaḥ ||
pūrvva sthādiṁśi raktaṁ meṁ kalāpariprigugandha maṇṇalake somovāṣṇtana itijñeyaḥ sitavarṇṇā jaṭāmuṁkuṭa dharobhujadvayoakṣasutraka maṇḍalūdharaṁkumunda puṣpāvasaktaḥ ||
asya bhojanaṁ gṛtodanaṁ |  śāvosa dhupaḥ ||
om candrā mṛtavikramāyaśītāṁ sa śave svāhā ||
dakṣiṇasyādi śiśiśraka kamalo paricandagandha maṇḍalake |  bhijurmaṅgalaścoktaṁ raktavarṇṇoratnama kuṭīśaktidharaḥ varadahastaḥ |
guguradhuyaḥ ||
om raktāṁṅga rasojvala kumārāya svāhā ||
paścimāyaṁdiśiraktapadamo parikṛṣṇo gurugandha maṇḍalakevraścavārī būdhuḥ syāpīta varṇṇaḥ raktasmaśruḥ akṣasutrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ p. 356 bhojanaṁmatsyaṁ muṁ gamāṣakṛsaraṁ ||
dhūpogandharasaḥ ||
uttarasyāṁ diśisita kamacalo paridevadāru gandhamaṇḍalake guruḥ parivrājaka guruḥ taptakāñcana varṇṇaḥ |
raktasmaśuḥ |  akṣasutra kamaṇḍaludharaṁ ||
madhugṛta dhūpaḥ |  om rohita varṇṇanirggamāya bṛhaspate bhāgāsyadāya svāya svāhā ||
agne yāṁdiśirakta padmo paricandanagandha maṇḍalakeśuklaḥ yāṇḍapaṭadhāriḥ |
gokṣīlavarṇṇa dhavalo bhojaṭāmaṁkūṭākṣa sutra kamaṇḍaladharaḥ ||
om namaḥ śuklādhipata ye surottamāya thurahe svāhā ||
naiṛtyāṁ diśi sitapaṅgakajo parinīlacanda gandhamaṇḍatmake |  śaniścaraḥ kṛṣṇa varṇṇaḥ kṣapana kojñayaḥ |
phaṇī bhṛtapītajaṭāmukuṭa raktaśātruḥ ||  akṣa sūtra kṣī kṣīrikādharaṁ ||
bhojanaṁ matsyamāṇa bhaśrukṛsaraḥ |  dhūpogandharasaḥ ||
om śaniśca |  rāyakṛ p. 357 ṣṇu vaṇṇa ya kṛpṇubhukasvāhā ||

vāyavyāṁraktāṁ bhojoparigatagarapāri gandha maṇḍalako kāpālikorākṣaḥ ||  rājavartta varṇṇa nibharddha deharavirathabhayānaka locana yu modraṣṭhākalyola bhṛkuṭī kṛtalalajñāṭaḥ paṁcavarṇṇamegha madhyeta labhujābhyā candra sūryā kevalābhinayasthitaḥ ||
asya deyaṁ māṣāniṣa bhojanaṁ ||  tilakṛthanovā vivarṇṇa dhūpaḥ ||

om namaḥ vikṛta vaktāya rudhirosinecāhme bhṛgāñcanasānnibhāya amṛta priyāya svāhā ||  eśānyāṁdiśśiraktasa roharūho paripukkā gandhamaṇḍalake cāṇḍālake turbhavetu ||  dhūtravarṇṇāḥ kṛtāṁñjali nāgāṁkṛtisva pucchabhṛtā |
asya bhojanaṁ ghṛtapurakaṁ sarjjarasa dhūpaḥ |
om namo dhrūmābhavarṇṇa sannibhā jyotiske tave svāhā |  muṇḍalapūrvva dvāre būdhyo bhagavān ||
dadavadvāre vajapāṇiḥ paścimadvāre lokanāthaḥ |
uttaradvāre mañjuśrīkumāraḥ ||
pūrva dakṣiṇa korṇasarvanakṣatrāḥ ||  dakṣiṇa paścima koṇe sarva padravāḥ ||
p. 358 paścimottara koṇe bhaṭṭārikāmahādevī ||  svetānīlāruṇatrimukhā prati mukhaṁ ninetraṁṣadbhu ja hasta dvayaśrena vyākhyāna mudrāḥ |
dakṣiṇe kuliśadharāḥ vāme padmavāmadharāḥ ||
ratna mukuṭhiṇī vajapayyañkā paviṣṭhā candrāsana samāsīna ||
